pageContext.claim: “The Democrats OBSTRUCTION of the desperately needed Wall, where they almost all recently agreed it should be built, is exceeded only by their OBSTRUCTION of 350 great people wanting & expecting to come into Government after being delayed for more than two years, a U.S. record!”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats have agreed to fund border security but there is little support among Democrats for Trump's wall. Democrats have slowed the pace of confirmation for administration positions, though Trump also has been slow to name people to posts. It's doubtful that 350 people have been waiting more than two years. First, Trump has not been president for two years. Second, he had trouble making timely confirmations. As of Dec. 23, The Washington Post tracker of 707 key administration positions showed 380 people had been confirmed, 195 were awaiting confirmation, nine were announced but had not been formally nominated and 126 positions still had no nominee.
